original_text:
Black Bull
Non far arrabbiare quel toro, perché è lui il grande protagonista della slot Black Bull di Pragmatic Play! La macchinetta si presenta sul mercato con la firma di uno dei provider più famosi a livello mondiale, che le permette di far vincere fino a 4.500 volte la puntata del giocatore. A livello di gioco è molto semplice e classica: prevede i giri gratuiti e un jolly che riesce a combinarsi con i simboli di gioco per aumentare le occasioni di vincita.
Se la osserviamo da lontano, notiamo che ha una struttura composta da 5 rulli e 4 file con 20 linee di pagamento. Ma cerchiamo di scoprire più da vicino come si presenta e che cosa offre questa slot!
Grafica e caratteristiche della slot Black Bull
Il nostro protagonista è furioso ed è pronto ad apparire sulla griglia, alternandosi a lupi, aquile, gechi e simboli che rappresentano le classiche carte da gioco. L’animazione dell’interno gameplay è piacevole, caratterizzata da alcune animazioni carine che conducono il giocatore verso la speranza di vittoria, ma soprattutto di attivare i bonus game.
Considera che nel gioco base, con 5 simboli uguali su una linea di pagamento si può ottenere da 4 a 25 volte la puntata. Non dimenticarti poi dei jolly che servono per sostituire tutti i simboli per formare le combinazioni vincenti. Inoltre con le icone del denaro potrai anche attivare la funzione giri gratuiti.
Bonus game e funzionalità 
Questa slot dal gameplay così scorrevole e semplice si presenta con un RTP abbastanza in linea con la media di mercato: è fissato al 96,51%, ed ha un’elevata volatilità. Ciò vuol dire che offre  ricompense non così frequenti ma di alto valore. Non a caso il suo potenziale di vincita giunge fino a 4.500 volte la puntata del giocatore.
Per movimentare un po’ le cose bisogna sperare di trovare i simboli di denaro che possono avere un valore compreso tra 0,5x e 50x, oltre ad attivare i giri gratuiti in base a quanto denaro trovi sulla griglia. Se hai 6-11 simboli ricevi 6 giri gratuiti, da 12 a 17 denari, si arriva invece a 8. Il tetto massimo è di 10 free spin se trovi da 18 a 20 icone della moneta.
È prevista la funzione di acquisto del round bonus per giocare con un tasso RTP più alto e sfidare davvero la sorte per un grande colpo!
Nel complesso la slot non è particolarmente accattivante e sorprendente, ma è divertente la funzione dei giri gratuiti che sfrutta un meccanismo diverso dal solito!

FAQ: Le risposte alle domande più frequenti 
Si gioca a Black Bull gratis?

Sì, puoi trovare la slot in versione For Fun, così da fare un po’ di pratica prima di scommettere soldi reali.



La slot Black Bull offre delle funzionalità speciali?

Sì, che sono la parte più affascinante del gioco: puoi ricevere fino a 10 giri gratuiti e sbloccare un round game anche acquistabile in gioco.



Qual è il potenziale di vincita di Black Bull?

Il suo potenziale di vincita è pari a un massimo di 4.500 volte la scommessa effettuata.

raw_translation.response:
Black Bull
Don't anger that bull, because it's the star of Pragmatic Play's Black Bull slot! This machine comes to market with the signature of one of the most famous providers worldwide, allowing for wins of up to 4,500 times the player's bet. The gameplay is simple and classic, featuring free spins and a wild symbol that can combine with game symbols to increase winning opportunities. 

From a distance, we notice that it has a structure composed of 5 reels and 4 rows with 20 paylines. But let's take a closer look at how this slot looks and what it offers!

Graphics and features of Black Bull slot 
Our protagonist is furious and ready to appear on the grid, alternating with wolves, eagles, geckos, and symbols representing classic playing cards. The animation of the gameplay is nice, characterized by some cute animations that lead the player towards the hope of victory, but above all, activating the bonus games. 

Consider that in the base game, with 5 equal symbols on a payline, you can get from 4 to 25 times the bet. Don't forget about the wilds that serve to replace all symbols to form winning combinations. Plus, with money icons, you can also activate the free spin feature.

Bonus game and functionality 
This slot with such smooth and simple gameplay comes with an RTP that is quite in line with the market average: it is set at 96.51%, and has high volatility. This means that it offers rewards that are not so frequent but of high value. It's no wonder that its winning potential reaches up to 4,500 times the player's bet.

To spice things up a bit, you have to hope to find money symbols that can have a value ranging from 0.5x to 50x, as well as activate free spins based on how much money you find on the grid. If you have 6-11 symbols, you receive 6 free spins, from 12 to 17 coins, you get 8 spins. The maximum limit is 10 free spins if you find 18 to 20 coin icons.

The function of buying the bonus round is expected to play with a higher RTP rate and really challenge fate for a big hit!

Overall, the slot is not particularly attractive and surprising, but the free spin function is fun and uses a mechanism different from usual.

FAQ: Answers to frequently asked questions 
Can I play Black Bull for free?

Yes, you can find the slot in For Fun version, so you can practice before betting real money. 

Does Black Bull slot offer special features?

Yes, they are the most fascinating part of the game: you can receive up to 10 free spins and unlock a bonus round that can also be purchased in-game.

What is the winning potential of Black Bull?

Its winning potential is up to a maximum of 4,500 times the bet placed.

Review: Black Bull
Don't anger that bull, because it's the star of Pragmatic Play's Black Bull slot! This machine comes to market with the signature of one of the most famous providers worldwide, allowing for wins of up to 4,500 times the player's bet. Graphics and features of Black Bull slot

Bonus game and functionality 
This slot with such smooth and simple gameplay comes with an RTP that is quite in line with the market average: it is set at 96.51%, and has high volatility. This means that it offers rewards that are not so frequent but of high value. It's no wonder that its winning potential reaches up to 4,500 times the player's bet.

To spice things up a bit, you have to hope to find money symbols that can have a value ranging from 0.5x to 50x, as well as activate free spins based on how much money you find on the grid. If you have 6-11 symbols, you receive 6 free spins, from 12 to 17 coins, you get 8 spins. The maximum limit is 10 free spins if you find 18 to 20 coin icons.

The function of buying the bonus round is expected to play with a higher RTP rate and really challenge fate for a big hit!

Black Bull features a free spin feature that can be triggered by finding money symbols. The number of free spins awarded depends on the number of money symbols found, with a maximum of 10 free spins for finding 18 to 20 coin icons. Additionally, players can purchase the bonus round for a higher RTP rate and more chances of winning big. The bonus round also offers a different mechanism than the base game, adding more excitement to the gameplay.

Review: Black Bull
Don't anger that bull, because it's the star of Pragmatic Play's Black Bull slot! This machine comes to market with the signature of one of the most famous providers worldwide, allowing for wins of up to 4,500 times the player's bet. The gameplay is simple and classic, featuring free spins and a wild symbol that can combine with game symbols to increase winning opportunities. 

From a distance, we notice that it has a structure composed of 5 reels and 4 rows with 20 paylines. But let's take a closer look at how this slot looks and what it offers!

Graphics and features of Black Bull slot 
Our protagonist is furious and ready to appear on the grid, alternating with wolves, eagles, geckos, and symbols representing classic playing cards. The animation of the gameplay is nice, characterized by some cute animations that lead the player towards the hope of victory, but above all, activating the bonus games. 

Consider that in the base game, with 5 equal symbols on a payline, you can get from 4 to 25 times the bet. Don't forget about the wilds that serve to replace all symbols to form winning combinations. Plus, with money icons, you can also activate the free spin feature.

Bonus game and functionality 
This slot with such smooth and simple gameplay comes with an RTP that is quite in line with the market average: it is set at 96.51%, and has high volatility. This means that it offers rewards that are not so frequent but of high value. It's no wonder that its winning potential reaches up to 4,500 times the player's bet.

To spice things up a bit, you have to hope to find money symbols that can have a value ranging from 0.5x to 50x, as well as activate free spins based on how much money you find on the grid. If you have 6-11 symbols, you receive 6 free spins, from 12 to 17 coins, you get 8 spins. The maximum limit is 10 free spins if you find 18 to 20 coin icons.
